showScoreExcerpt:
“Director and choreographer Josh Rhodes keeps things moving at a swift pace and manages to keep his group of clowns from upstaging one another (no easy task). It’s a wonderful ensemble effort and Rhodes’s work here is first-rate...But, like this new ‘Spamalot’, it’s irresistible and sends the audience out on a cloud of comedy.”

Read more
